Text.Page: <PCNAME>, I need your help. Please come see me as soon as you can.
Getty needed materials for a special invention, and asked <PCNAME> to get them.
I'll never finish now. This is hopeless...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What's wrong, Getty?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I've been working on a new invention to help people better manage their inventory. But my suppliers have run out of a crucial object, and now all my hard work is wasted!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Is there something I can do?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I'm not sure. Do you have an Elemental Awl?

Of course you don't. No one does, and now I don't know what to do."Why did you send for me, then?"

Huh?

Oh, ! Yes, of course! Sorry, I've been distracted, and I totally forgot! I was hoping you'd help me test out my new invention, you see, but it's just not ready.

I don't have the tool I need to complete it."An Elemental Awl, right?"

Yes, exactly! I've been constructing an interdimensional storage that will classify items and automatically store them as they're acquired!

I wish I could show you a prototype, but without the awl...

Say, , can you get an Elemental Awl for me?"Where can I find one?"

So, umm, my normal supplier is...indisposed, and their inventory...unavailable. I heard from a...friend that there are mystery merchants in the city, selling unique objects.

It could be expensive, though. You might need the contents of this box.
Nothing illegal, I promise! just a purple jewel I've been saving for a rainy day.

Spend it wisely, . It's literally one of a kind.

It should be more than enough to by an Elemental Awl."Where are these merchants?"

Well...that's the thing. I've heard of them, but I haven't actually seem them for myself.

Elthienne should know where to find them, though. The Hands of Velika know everything that goes on in this city.

You should go ask her.
What brings you here, <PCNAME>?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I need something from a...mystery merchant."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

A mystery merchant?

You must mean those fools wearing masks.

There's already plenty of merchants in Velika, but these so-called "mystery merchants" pride themselves both on anonymity, and exclusivity.

I heard that they get their supplies from the goblins, but my Fingers tell me what they have is nearly worthless."Where can I find them?"

The last I heard, there was one hanging out near the North Gate.

Down the stairs, take a turn to the right, and you should see them. If they've decided to sell things today, that is. They're not always open for business.

Ah, the look on your face...you must be a customer in need!

I'm not selling at the moment, but I'm willing to listen to your story."I want to buy an Elemental Awl."

Elemental Awl?

Yes, very rare. very powerful.

I don't have any in stock right now...though I do know someone who might."Who is it?"

You know, there's not much difference between exchanging information and making a sale.

You give me something I need, and I'll give you a map that shows where you can buy an Elemental Awl.

Something...shiny, I think. And purple!

This Mystery Market Coin should make us even.

Take the coin and follow the map.

You'll be able to exchange the coin for an Elemental Awl when you arrive.
If you want to know more, you need to pay a price.
Need something?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm looking for an Elemental Awl."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Elemental Awl...

Yes, I have one.

But I'll need to see your coin first."You mean this?"
Indeed. Since you have an <font color='#0080FF'>Mystery Market Coin</font>, I'll honor my debt to the one who gave it to you. Please, take the awl.
An <font color='#0080FF'>Elemental Awl</font> looks ordinary. but is useful for many special things.

A pleasure doing business with you.

I travel around Essenia, so perhaps we'll meet again. And keep an eye our for more coins, they'll be useful in the future.

Elemental Awl? Yes, I have one.

Up for sale, if you want it.

!

Did you really get me an Elemental Awl? I hope it wasn't too much trouble.

Now I can finish the Pocket Tab for you!"Calm down, now."

Thank you so much!

, you'll be the first one to use my customizable, sortable, and expandable Pocket Tab system!

==================================
You can now use the Pocket.
==================================
I need an <font color='#0080FF'>Elemental Awl</font> to complete my Pocket Tab system.
